participant_1.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. my favorite band is rascal flats. i'm a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three.

content.text: no unfortunately an older couple adopted me when i was little
